name: CV/ML Engineer
description:
Tangiblee (Chicago, USA) is creating Augmented Reality (AR) solutions for e-commerce that
are utilized by millions of online shoppers worldwide. Our client base includes renowned brands like Fossil, Pandora, Coach, and many others.
We are a remote first and geek-friendly team of professionals.
Our solution
With Tangiblee's AR solution, retailers can create a more engaging and personalized shopping experience for their customers. Our technology allows shoppers to visualize size, virtually try-on various items, and even furnish their apartments online, leading to happier and more satisfied customers. By combining the online and offline shopping experience, Tangiblee AR is transforming the way people shop and ultimately improving the overall shopping experience.
Requirements
The ideal candidate should have:
● A minimum of 2 years of commercial experience in a related field
● The ability to work independently with minimum supervision, as well as thrive in a
collaborative team environment
● Technical expertise in Python, as well as knowledge of any other programming language
is a plus
● Strong knowledge of Computer Vision fundamentals and classical image processing
algorithms
● Strong theoretical knowledge in Machine Learning and Deep Learning
● Solid understanding of practical machine learning techniques, including data collection,
training, evaluation, and iterative improvements
● Proficiency with such libraries and frameworks as numpy, scipy, OpenCV, TensorFlow,
and PyTorch
● Portfolio with any projects related to Augmented Reality will be a great plus
● Experience with classical (space carving) and NN-based (Nerf) 3D reconstruction
techniques would be a great pus
● Experience with segmentation (semantic, instance, panoptic) will be a plus
● A proven ability to design and implement complex algorithms, and be analytical and
creative in a problem-solving environment
● A Bachelor's degree or equivalent in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, or a
related field
● Strong communication and presentation skills
● At least an intermediate level of English proficiency

Responsibilities
We're currently seeking a skilled Computer Vision engineer to augment our team's capabilities
and expand our product's existing functionalities to include new product categories.
Your key responsibilities will involve:
- Utilizing Machine Learning and Computer Vision technology to address real-world issues for
our market-ready product.
- Actively contributing to business development and growth by presenting innovative and
unconventional concepts.
- Demonstrating your work to colleagues.
- Working closely with other techies, such as software engineers, data scientists, and product
managers, to make sure that Computer Vision solutions meet the product's requirements and
help the business grow.
- Keeping up with the latest research and trends in Computer Vision and Machine Learning, and
using this knowledge to make our product even better and more awesome!

What we offer:

  • The job able to challenge any depth of ambitions

  • Work remotely or in the modern office in the center of Minsk

  • Formal employment starting from day one

  • Paid vacation (25 calendar days) and sick leave

  • Health insurance

  • Education and hobbies reimbursement


Tips on the cover letter, for attentive applicants :)

1) Total commercial experience (years/months)

2) A brief description of the last project you worked on, your role and job responsibilities

We make sure to respond to every application, please take a couple of minutes to write a cover letter and help us get to know you. Thanks!
